events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message mentioned a refund, so this case is categorized under the Refund cluster for proper handling.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah M., who specializes in handling refund requests.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear the product did not meet your expectations, and I’m here to assist you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and explain what was wrong with the product, so we can process your refund quickly?
My order number is 458923. The product arrived damaged with several scratches, and I really want a full refund, not an exchange.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for it to reflect.
Thanks for handling this quickly. I appreciate the refund process and will look out for the confirmation email.
The refund process has been completed on our end. You should receive a confirmation shortly via email. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund and that everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
We are closing this case now as the refund was successfully processed and confirmed. Thank you for contacting support.
